properties.entry: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO , USER_NO , STORE_NO , CONTENT , GRADE ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT REVIEW_NO, USER_ID, CONTENT, ISSUE_DATE, GRADE, ( SELECT LISTAGG(IMG_ROOT || CHANGE_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY IMG_NO) FROM REVIEW_IMAGE WHERE REVIEW_IMAGE.REVIEW_NO = REVIEW.REVIEW_NO ) AS IMAGES FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE STORE_NO = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
INSERT INTO REVIEW_IMAGE ( IMG_NO , REVIEW_NO , IMG_ROOT , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , IMG_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_REV_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_REVNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
